title: AI literacy is not a luxury, but Brussels is failing to see the danger
summary_full: As uncertainty grows about AI’s expanding capabilities, the EU's best shot at gaining a competitive advantage is to foster an AI ecosystem rooted in trust
summary_public: As uncertainty grows about AI’s expanding capabilities, the EU's best shot at gaining a competitive advantage is to foster an AI ecosystem rooted in trust

BE.label: neutral
BE.evidence: Brussels is failing to see the danger
